How many people are affected by lysinuric protein intolerance ?,"Lysinuric protein intolerance is estimated to occur in 1 in 60,000 newborns in Finland and 1 in 57,000 newborns in Japan. Outside these populations this condition occurs less frequently, but the exact incidence is unknown.",GHR,lysinuric protein intolerance
